pullRequest.title: Use ID Tag UserNames in Block / Memory Tables
pullRequest.bodyText:
Attempt to use ID Tag UserNames in Block / Memory Tables
ID Tag Table attempts to use Reporter UserName
Fixes possible deference in IDTagTable
See #8088

commit.message:
Use ID Tag UserNames in Block / Memory Tables

ID Tag Table attempts to use Reporter UserName
Fixes possible deference in IDTagTable

nodes.bodyText: Don't say "attempts" here, just say the IDTags table uses the Reporter user name for location if it is available (and similarly for the line above).
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -431,7 +431,8 @@

Turnouts, Lights, Sensors and other elements

    -
  • +
  • The Block Table and Memory Table attempt to use UserName for Reportable objects ( eg. ID Tags )
    • +
  • ID Tag Table attempts to use Reporter UserName for Location

nodes.bodyText: Since we know the object is a Bean, shouldn't we use getDisplayName instead of toString?
